title: Photo of Vice President Mike Pence during the singing of the National Anthem at Lucas Oil Stadium â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
October 8, 2017
Vice President Mike Pence, Second Lady Karen Pence, and Major General Courtney P. Carr stand for the singing of the National Anthem at Lucas Oil Stadium before the start of the Indianapolis Colts game against the San Francisco 49ers prior to leaving the game on Sunday, October 8, 2017. (Official White House photo by Myles Cullen)
